name: Match the brick
description:
"Match the brick" is a game developed for "Una JAM diversa - ITA" with the optional rule "High contrast".

Your goal is matching all the bricks changing properly your shape.
The key allowed are:

  • Left/Right arrow to move
  • Spacebar to shift on the next shape
  • 1, 2, 3 to change directly the shape

Special thanks to Chiara and mattking, for beta testing and tips.

* = * =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* = * =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =* =

Developed with Unity by Andrea "SomaOS" Somaini

Music and Sounds: bought on humblebundle
